title: real security risk
extract: Definition of security risk. 1 : someone who could damage an organization by giving information to an enemy or competitor. 2 : someone or something that is a risk to safety Any package left unattended will be deemed a security risk.
extract_html: Definition of security risk. 1 : someone who could damage an organization by giving information to an enemy or competitor. 2 : someone or something that is a risk to safety Any package left unattended will be deemed a security risk.
